body.name: Sonim XP3 Plus XP3900 4G LTE 16GB AT&T GSM Unlocked Black Rugged Flip Cellphone Like New (Renewed)
body.description: Introducing Sonim XP3plus -The ultra-rugged flip that does more -for less. When lowering costs is as critical as the mission itself, no ordinary mobile device will do. That’s why Sonim XP3plus has been designed to maximize functionality with a larger screen and programmable buttons. But keep operation costs low by retaining the Sonim legacy of the most rugged flips in the business. More ways to be productive and accomplish any missionSimple, intuitive user interface with three new internal soft keys that change dynamically depending upon the display. Two new external buttons, one which can be customized to user functions; the other that can answer, end or mute calls, or display call log. Long Battery Life, the strongest in its’ class, enables working a full shift without recharging Built to industry-leading Rugged Performance Standards, including MIL-STD-810H and Non-Incendive Class I, II and III Div 2 ratings, the XP3plus thrives in the most hazardous and extreme conditions. 100 dB+ speaker and noise cancellation ensure your communication is loud and clear, even over machinery, sirens and severe weather. Large, tactile, glove-friendly buttons and volume controls offer quick, mistake-free communication when it matters most. User programmable Emergency and PTT Buttons, making it easy to get help quickly, when you need it. Sonim SecureAudio 3.5mm Connector provides secure, more reliable connections with wired audio accessories. Store and access more data, more media with an expandable micro-SD card slot capable of up to 256GB. Global LTE to keep you connected wherever the job takes you. Capture images or video on the go with a built-in 8.0 MP camera. The XP3plus Difference. More toughness. More functionality. More value. How do you improve upon an already great flip?You give it more functionality to meet mission-critical needs without sacrificing any of the toughness. The All-New, Ultra-Rugged XP3plus. A rugged flip. And then some.Glove-friendly and Push-to-Talk.Maintain quick and mistake-free communication with large, tactile volume controls and easy-to-use Push-to-Talk, even while wearing gloves.Install, manage and control your devices with SonimWare, Sonim’s comprehensive set of software tools, applications and utilities.Optimize employee productivity by deploying devices more quickly, more efficiently and controlling app usage remotely.
